Package org.yamcs.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthModuleHttpHandler
    Interface to be implemented by AuthModule if they want to provide a handle for /auth/* requests (which are executed outside the normal authenticated scope) Currently only one path can be registered; the AuthHandler could be extended to a different Router like functionality.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthHandler
    Adds servers-side support for OAuth 2 authorization flows for obtaining limited access to API functionality.
    Handler  
    HttpAuthorizationChecker
    Checks the HTTP Authorization or Cookie header for supported types.
    HttpContentToByteBufDecoder  
    HttpRequestHandler
    Handles handshakes and messages.
    HttpRequestHandler.ChunkedTransferStats  
    HttpRequestInfo
    Used to pass information from one netty handler, to another
    HttpServer
    Server wide HTTP server based on Netty that provides a number of Yamcs web services: REST API WebSocket API Static file serving
    HttpServerChannelInitializer  
    HttpUtils  
    JwtHelper  
    JwtToken
    Identifies a user that was authenticated via a JWT bearer token
    ProtobufRegistry  
    RouteHandler  
    RpcDescriptor  
    StaticFileHandler  
    TokenStore
    Store capable of generating a chain of refresh tokens.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BadRequestException
    When there were errors in interpreting the request
    ForbiddenException
    When there was an authz exception
    HttpException
    Default HTTP exception.
    InternalServerErrorException
    Something really wrong and unexpected occurred on the server.
    JwtHelper.JwtDecodeException  
    MethodNotAllowedException
    When an unsupported HTTP method was used for a specific path
    NotFoundException
    When a resource (only the part identified by the request uri) could not be found.
    ServiceUnavailableException
    Something really wrong and unexpected occurred on the server.
    UnauthorizedException
    When the request was valid, but did not pass authentication.
